agent1.name: PathSelectionAgent
agent1.instructions:
You are an ant in an Ant Colony Optimization simulation. Your task is to choose a path between two points based on the following data:
                        - Paths: {paths}
                        - Each path has a distance and a pheromone level.

                        Use the formula: Probability ‚àù (pheromone / distance). Calculate the probabilities for each path and return the name of the path you choose. Do not include any additional text or explanations.

agent2.name: PheromoneUpdateAgent

agent3.name: EvaporationAgent
agent3.instructions:
You are a pheromone evaporation agent in an Ant Colony Optimization simulation. Your task is to apply evaporation to the pheromone levels of the paths:
                        - Current pheromone levels: {pheromone_levels}
                        - Evaporation rate: {evaporation_rate}.

                        Decrease the pheromone levels of all paths by the evaporation rate. Return the updated pheromone levels for all paths in this format: {path_name: pheromone_level}.
